attributes.action: urge NICE to examine the feasibility of suplying Tamiflu and Relenza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Criticisms, reported today by AOL, highlight the inefficacy of the flu vaccine. Dr Graeme Laver, who helped create the jab more than 40 years ago, believes it should not be relied upon to protect from a potentially severe flu epidemic.

The Australian scientist also claims that people's lives could be saved if drugs such as Tamiflu and Relenza were used instead, once the disease has already struck. So the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to examine the feasibility of supplying this on the NHS and over the counter,as  Dr Laver advises.
